questions.question: What does Ross ask his friends to help him with?
options: To move into a new apartment
To understand a skin abnormality on his body
To learn how to play the guitar
questions.correct_answer: To understand a skin abnormality on his body
questions.explanation: Ross asks his friends to help him identify a mysterious growth on his body.

questions.question: What is Phoebe's profession?
questions.explanation: Phoebe is a musician who plays her music at Central Perk.

questions.question: What is the name of Phoebe's date who is a fireman?
questions.explanation: Vince is a fireman and one of Phoebe's dates.

questions.question: What does Monica think Pete means when he says 'we need to talk'?
options: That he wants to break up with her
That he wants to get married
That he wants to go on a trip
That he wants to discuss their relationship
questions.correct_answer: That he wants to break up with her
questions.explanation: Monica thinks that when someone says 'we need to talk', it usually means something bad.

questions.question: What does Ross's doctor say about the skin abnormality?
options: That it's a skin abnormality but can't identify it
questions.correct_answer: That it's a skin abnormality but can't identify it
questions.explanation: Ross's doctor can't identify the skin abnormality and is reluctant to remove it.

questions.question: What does Phoebe decide to do about her two dates?
options: To break up with both of them
To continue dating both of them
To introduce them to each other
questions.explanation: Phoebe decides to choose one of her dates, Vince, because he is 'burly' and sensitive.

questions.question: What is the name of the guru who treats Ross's skin abnormality?
questions.explanation: Guru Saj is the herbalist who treats Ross's skin abnormality.

questions.question: What does Pete want to become?
questions.explanation: Pete wants to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion as his next challenge.

questions.question: What happens when Phoebe tries to break up with Jason?
options: He cries and writes in his journal
He tries to make up with her
He doesn't care and walks away
questions.explanation: Jason gets angry and leaves when Phoebe tries to break up with him.

questions.question: What do Vince and Jason say to Phoebe when they find out she's been dating both of them?
options: They get angry and fight each other
They tell her it's okay and that they never said it was exclusive
They try to make her choose between them
They walk away and never talk to her again
questions.correct_answer: They tell her it's okay and that they never said it was exclusive
questions.explanation: Vince and Jason tell Phoebe that they never said it was exclusive and that it's okay.

questions.question: What does Ross's thing get caught on?
questions.explanation: Ross's thing gets caught on Guru Saj's watch.

questions.question: What is the name of the medical condition that Guru Saj claims Ross has?
questions.explanation: Guru Saj claims that Ross has a koondis, but it's unclear what that means.

questions.question: What does Monica think about Pete's decision to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion?
options: She thinks it's a great idea
She thinks it's a bad idea
questions.explanation: Monica is surprised by Pete's decision to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when she sees Jason at Central Perk?
options: She talks to him and explains the situation
She ignores him and continues playing her music
She gets angry and confronts him
questions.correct_answer: She tries to avoid him but ends up losing her ability to pronounce words
questions.explanation: Phoebe tries to avoid Jason but ends up losing her ability to pronounce words when she sees him at Central Perk.

questions.question: What does Rachel suggest Monica do for her wedding theme?
options: A 'Look how much money we've got' theme
questions.correct_answer: A 'Look how much money we've got' theme
questions.explanation: Rachel suggests that Monica have a 'Look how much money we've got' theme for her wedding.

questions.question: What does Joey suggest they do to Pete's plants if he breaks up with Monica?
questions.explanation: Joey jokingly suggests that they pee on Pete's plants if he breaks up with Monica.

questions.question: What does Chandler say about his experience with a third nipple?
options: That it was a big deal
That it was no big deal
questions.correct_answer: That it was no big deal and his doctor just lopped it off
questions.explanation: Chandler says that having a third nipple was no big deal and his doctor just removed it.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about Vince and Jason?
options: That Vince is burly and Jason is sensitive
That Jason is burly and Vince is sensitive
questions.correct_answer: That Vince is burly and Jason is sensitive
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that Vince is burly and Jason is sensitive.

questions.question: What does Ross say about his thing?
questions.explanation: Ross says that his thing is a skin abnormality.

questions.question: What does Monica say about Pete's decision to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion?
options: That she thinks it's a bad idea
questions.correct_answer: That she thinks it's a bad idea
questions.explanation: Monica is worried about Pete's decision to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when she breaks up with Vince?
questions.explanation: Phoebe feels guilty when she breaks up with Vince.

questions.question: What does Jason do when he finds out Phoebe has been dating Vince?
options: He tries to make up with her
questions.explanation: Jason gets angry and leaves when he finds out Phoebe has been dating Vince.

questions.question: What does Guru Saj use to try and remove Ross's thing?
questions.explanation: Guru Saj tries to use love to remove Ross's thing.
